title: Options for Repairing Google Pixel 5 Screen with Dead Pixel
content:
Hi,

I am writing to check on the available options for fixing a Google Pixel 5 that I have purchased from Amazon on December 2020.

Issue: There is an approximately 1*0.2cm dead pixel region around the proximity sensor region of the phone.

What I have attempted so far:
Followed the steps and attempted troubleshooting based on the instructions from this page: Fix a Pixel screen that doesn't work right
Contacted my local (Singapore) repair partner - CTDi. They have responded saying that they are currently unable to offer support for Pixel 5 and recommended that I contact Google Support for an alternative solution.

Question: What are the available options available to me in resolving this issue?

Thank you!
